channel.title: Problem with compile
channel.description:
when i click compile it says
'the system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue...'
if i click on edit, my compiler says
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]
i looked onto add and remove programs and it says that i got java (tm) 6 update 2.
this is in my java folder..
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mbom0i.jpg[/img]
what do i need to do so my compiler works??
please help. thanks,

item.title: Problem with compile
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:2, topic:257048”]Replace with:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/quote]

do i need to change it to 0 on enviroments too?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 18, 2009, 04:28:05 am[/size][hr]any1 help?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with compile
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Replace with:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

press any key to continue…’
